short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save selected text and image, and list saved text and image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension saves selected text and images. To save them, select Save from the right-click menu. Saved images can be listed by clicking on the extension's icon. In the list, you can edit or delete items. The URL where the item was saved is also saved at the same time and can be accessed.
